long_description: With a smooth, 7-speed internal hub and a comfortable rider position, the Raleigh Mesika 3.0 women's bike offers hassle-free commutes and easy-going comfort on urban rides. Butted aluminum frame features a women-specific geometry and a formed down tube for comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position. Gates carbon belt drive and a Shimano Nexus Internal hub offer quiet, nearly maintenance-free shifting. 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda K-192 tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets alike. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). Convenient platform pedals. The Raleigh Mesika 3.0 women's bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: With a smooth, 7-speed internal hub and a comfortable rider position, the Raleigh Mesika 3.0 women's bike offers hassle-free commutes and easy-going comfort on urban rides.
